title: When are we going to see Cassiopeia's Jade Fang skin bug fixed?
body: Cassiopeia's Twin Fang has been showing the old cast animation in ADDITION to the new cast animation for 6 months now. Are we going to see this addressed at some point??

replies.body: It's fixed with this patch, patch 5.4. :]
I'll check it out, thank you for the reply!! (didn't see it in the patch notes)

No worries! 

Sometimes, smaller things aren't included. I logged the bug initially, so I can tell you it's taken care of! ^-^
Yeah, I just played a game with her and it looks a lot cleaner now! Thanks so much!
What was the bug? I've heard a ton of complaints about it, but never really noticed anything weird with it.
Can we add this to the patch notes under "Bug Fixes", so we can give you guys more credit?
